attributes.action: consider the following: It's reported that the Royal Bank of Scotland (RBS), which received £20 billion of taxpayers' money, plans to give £1b of it out in bonuses to bankers and traders.  We believe this is morally and economically outrageous and should be stopped.  The taxpayer owes 68% of RBS so we are now ALL shareholders.  So as shareholders, we therefore call on the board of RBS to announce that their bankers and traders will receive NO bonus this year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Copy of petition opened by John Prescott on www.petitions.com

John Prescott wrote: "It's reported that the Royal Bank of Scotland (RBS), which received £20 billion of taxpayers' money, plans to give £1b of it out in bonuses to bankers and traders.

We believe this is morally and economically outrageous and should be stopped.

The taxpayer owes 68% of RBS so we are now ALL shareholders.

So as shareholders, we therefore call on the board of RBS to announce that their bankers and traders will receive NO bonuses this year."

BRIAN SEMMENS

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
